sentences.en: " Oh , shut up , you clown ! "
sentences.cn: “ 嗳, 你这 小花脸!

sentences.en: A clown's job is to amuse the spectators.
sentences.cn: 小丑的工作就是娱乐观众.

sentences.en: Doesn't the clown look funny!
sentences.cn: 这小丑看上去真是滑稽!

sentences.en: Frankie’s a bit of a clown.
sentences.cn: 弗朗基喜欢开开玩笑。

sentences.en: He clowned with John Belushi and Bill Murray in National Lampoon shows.
sentences.cn: 他与约翰·贝鲁西和比尔·默里在全国讽刺作品表演会上一起扮演小丑。

sentences.en: He was laughing, the clown of the twosome.
sentences.cn: 他在笑，二人搭档中逗人乐的那个。

sentences.en: He will go to clown school.
sentences.cn: 他将去小丑学校上学。

sentences.en: I just curled up when I saw her dressed as a clown.
sentences.cn: 我见她打扮得像个小丑,把我笑得直不起腰来.

sentences.en: No fine clothes can hide the clown.
sentences.cn: 好衣难遮丑.

sentences.en: That boy's a bit of a clown!
sentences.cn: 那男孩有点儿滑稽!

sentences.en: The boy plays the clown to get attention.
sentences.cn: 那男孩作出滑稽的动作以便引人注意.

sentences.en: The clown grimaced at the children.
sentences.cn: 小丑向孩子们做鬼脸.

sentences.en: The clown had the children in hysterics.
sentences.cn: 那小丑逗得孩子们笑作一团.

sentences.en: The clown tickled the audience with his funny actions.
sentences.cn: 小丑用滑稽动作逗观众发笑.

sentences.en: The moment the clown appeared on stage, the audience folded up.
sentences.cn: 小丑一出现在舞台上, 观众们个个笑得前俯后仰.

sentences.en: The performance of the clown kept the public rolling about.
sentences.cn: 小丑的表演使观众笑得前仰后合。

sentences.en: The star clown was considered a master of witty banter.
sentences.cn: 那丑星被认为是个逗乐子的好手.

sentences.en: We disguised Tom as a clown for the party.
sentences.cn: 晚会上我们把汤姆装扮成小丑.

sentences.en: When she learned how to do this, I was ready to let her step over a clown.
sentences.cn: 当她学习了该如何做这的时候,我准备好让在一个小丑上的她步骤.

sentences.en: When the clown comes into town, the dogs come out to howl.
sentences.cn: 小丑进了城, 狗儿们就要出来狂吠.

trans.tran_en: someone who wears funny clothes, a red nose, bright  make-up  on their face etc, and does silly things to make people laugh, especially at a  circus
If you clown, you do silly things in order to make people laugh
